retrievingdata: OH! A small glass of liquor!
datarestored: Ok, let's get this job started.
greyuser: Don't you dare tell me what to do!
Only bouncers and up can run a bot.
bouncer: How do you expect me to move? I'm only able to bounce!
The bot can't move people when it's run as a bouncer.
online: /me I'm a %%BOTNAME%% from v%%VERSION%%. Bar's open!
welcomeback: /me Hey @%%NAME%%! What did tell you about sneaking around!
songknown: /me :repeat: This song has been played %%PLAYS%% time(s) in the last %%TIMETOTAL%%, last play was %%LASTTIME%% ago. :repeat:
timelimit: /me @%%NAME%%, your song is longer than %%MAXLENGTH%% minutes, you need permission to play longer songs.
permissionownsong: /me :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isopen: /me The roulette is now open! Type !join to participate!
winnerpicked: /me A winner has been picked! @%%NAME%% to position %%POSITION%%.
alreadyadding: /me User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me Added @%%NAME%% to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: /me @%%NAME%% did not disconnect during my time here.
noposition: /me No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: /me @%%NAME%%'s last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago: %%TIME%%.
valid: /me @%%NAME%% disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: /me Hey @%%NAME%%! Are you awake? Get back to me within 2 minutes or you'll be booted from the list!
/me @%%NAME%%, you have been afk for %%TIME%%, please respond within 2 minutes or you will be removed.
warning2: /me @%%NAME%%, you better be sober or I'm booting you out! Last chance son!
/me @%%NAME%%, you will be removed due to AFK soon if you don't respond.
afkremove: /me That's it @##NAME##! You're outta there! Go home boy! You're drunk!
/me @%%NAME%%, you have been removed for being afk for %%TIME%%. You were at position %%POSITION%%. Chat at least once every %%MAXIMUMAFK%% minutes if you want to play a song.
spam: /me @%%NAME%%, here's an idea to stop spamming...GET YOUR CAT OFF THE KEYBOARD!
roomadvertising: /me Hey @%%NAME%%! None  of this digital addressing in my Club!
/me @%%NAME%%, don't post links to other rooms please.
adfly: /me @%%NAME%%, please change your autowoot program. We suggest PlugCubed: http://plugcubed.net/
activeusersintime: /me [@%%NAME%% There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me [@%%NAME%%] Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
autowoot: /me We recommend PlugCubed (ALPHA) for autowooting @ http://plugcubed.net/ OR a pair of Beer Goggles @ http://tinyurl.com/CRevZBeerGoggles
/me We recommend PlugCubed for autowooting: http://plugcubed.net/
brandambassador: /me A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: http://blog.plug.dj/brand-ambassadors/
bouncerplusrank: /me @%%NAME%%, you ain't my manager to tell me to operate Bouncer+!
/me @%%NAME%% You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+.
eatcookie: /me secretly sips a glass of bourbon.
nousercookie: /em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and drinks it himself.
/em doesn't see %%NAME%% in room and eats a cookie himself.
selfcookie: /me @%%NAME%%, you're a bit drunk, aren't you? Stop drinking yourself and share with other people!
/me @%%NAME, you're a bit greedy, aren't you? Giving cookies to yourself, bah. Share some with other people!
cycleguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, you are not on the waitlist.
eta: /me @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%. Grab a drink in meantime.
/me @%%NAME%% you will reach the booth in approximately %%TIME%%.
starterhelp: /me This image will get you started on plug: %%LINK%%
roulettejoin: /me @%%NAME%% joined the roulette! (!leave if you regret it.)
jointime: /me [@%%NAMEFROM%%] @%%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me [@%%NAME%%] you can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: /me @%%NAME%%, @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from Club RevolutionZ for %%TIME%% minutes.
/me [@%%NAME%%], @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes.
kill: I'm hit! I can see the light! Mama? Is that you?
songlink: /me Psst @%%NAME%%! Here's the link to current song: %%LINK%%
lockskippos: /me [@%%NAME%%] Lockskip will now move the dj to position %%POSITION%%.
lockguardtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me [@%%NAME%%] The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
motdintervalset: /me MotD interval has been set to %%INTERVAL%%.
addbotwaitlist: /me @%%NAME%%, if I get on to console, who's gonna manage the Bar? Come on man! Let me do my darn job!
/me @%%NAME%%, don't try to add me to the waitlist, please.
mutedmaxtime: /me Sorry @%%NAME%%, but the superglue can only last for %%TIME%% minutes.
/me [@%%NAME%%] You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
unmuted: /me @%%NAME%% has used a solvent to remove the superglu off @%%USERNAME%%'s mouth.
muterank: /me @%%NAME%% You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
pong: /me None of that fapping young boy!!
reload: /me I need to take a leak. Be right back.
removenotinwl: /me [@%%NAME%%] Specified user @%%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: /me @%%NAME%% Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%.
madeby: I was genectically modified and cloned by %%NAME%%
swapinvalid: /me [@%%NAME%%] Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: /me [@%%NAME%%] Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: /me Please find the permissible room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: /me [@%%NAME%%] Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: /me [@%%NAME%%] You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: /me [@%%NAME%%] The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.
